6.content: Hello, we're pleased to introduce our new newsfeed. Here we will inform you about new versions, bugs, errors, review dates and many more... Be sure to check in regularly :-)

5.content: Check out the new version. Also take a close look to the changelog.

4.cardtitle: Actually no package deliver to generali
4.content: Due to an technical error there is no package deliver to the generali nexus. We're working on a solution.

3.content: We released a hotfix version for 0.50.0 to fix two bugs that were critical to some projects.

2.content: Check out the new version. Also take a close look to the changelog. We have some breaking changes here.

1.content: Check out our newest version. We have a new round shaped component for you!
